a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Greenhouse gas emissions by sector, World

Greenhouse gas emissions
are measured in tonnes of
carbon dioxide-equivalents
over a 100-year timescale.

g.text: Land-use change and forestry Land-use change and forestry
Manufacturing and construction Manufacturing and construction
Electricity and heat Electricity and heat
Other fuel combustion Other fuel combustion
Aviation and shipping Aviation and shipping

text.tspan: Note: Land-use change emissions can be negative.
